revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sitecom |model=WL-309 |revision=v1 (001) |ean=8716502016723 |asin=B003GQRR9W;GB; |est_release_date=05/2010 |fcc_date=02/10/2010 |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U2M-SR9855G |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP7150U |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module=EnGenius EMP-7605 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9220 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=EnGenius EMP-9605 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCI |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9223 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|Wireless Simultaneous Dualband 300N XR Gigabit Gaming Router II}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Sitecom|pid=wl-309v1001|pname=wireless-simultaneous-dualband-300n-xr-gigabit-gaming-router-ii}}
This device would appear to share the same board as the [[EnGenius ESR9855G]].
Each WiFi radio (EMP-7605 + <small>presumably a</small> EMP-9605) is using :one internal antenna and one external antenna.
*[http://www.sitecom.com/en/sitecom-news/231/2153 '''Sitecom''' news] about the device (released ~ May 2010) *[http://www.hwupgrade.it/articoli/periferiche/2470/sitecom-wl-309-gaming-router-con-streamengine_3.html Review on '''hwupgrade.it'''] (IT) (w/ internal shots) *[http://uk.hardware.info/productinfo/96863/sitecom-wl-309-gaming-router On '''uk.hardware.info'''] (tested)
